body.name: WOLF GOURMET Programmable Coffee Maker System with 10 Cup Thermal Carafe, Built-In Grounds Scale, Removable Reservoir, Red Knob, Stainless Steel (WGCM100S)
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: SUPERIOR-TASTING COFFEE: The Wolf Gourmet programmable coffee maker uses the optimal brewing temperature, extraction method, and time to craft the perfect cup of coffee.
UNIQUE ACCU-BREW MODE: Built-in scale weighs coffee grounds as you add it to the brew basket to ensure the ideal coffee-to-water ratio.
PROGRAMMABLE SETTINGS: Brew on Accu-Brew or Manual modes. Adjustable brew strength from mild to bold offers a customizable experience.
STAINLESS STEEL THERMAL CARAFE: 10-cup carafe with double-wall construction keeps coffee hot and fresh.
EASY TO FILL: Load coffee grounds into the smooth-glide, front-load brew basket. The removable side-access reservoir can be filled right in the sink.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Wolf Gourmet programmable coffee maker brews a superior-tasting cup using the optimal temperature, time, and extraction method. An integrated grounds scale lets you know exactly how much coffee to add for your preferred strength, so you can recreate your favorite cup of coffee again and again. You might not see all of the internal upgrades we made to the Wolf Gourmet coffee maker ­– like the shower head that was designed to meet strict extraction standards or the fine-tuned heating element – but you’ll taste the difference. Five boldness options allow you to tailor your batch exactly how you like it.

Accu-Brew Technology The Accu-Brew setting lets you know exactly how much ground coffee you need to achieve your preferred boldness, so you will achieve a consistent taste you can recreate over and over again whether you are brewing four cups or ten. An integrated scale weighs the grounds as you add them to the brew basket, while the easy-to-read LCD display lets you know when to stop.
Thermal Carafe The double-walled, stainless steel carafe keeps coffee hot and fresh long after it is brewed.
Removable Water Reservoir Detaches from the side of the coffee system for easy filling. An integrated water filter reduces chlorine for improved taste.
Front Load Brew Basket A smooth-glide drawer allows easy access to the brew basket from the front of the unit, no shifting from under the cabinets required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent coffee, safe under cupboards, simple controls, pricey
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Replaced an old Cuisinart coffee maker with the Wolf. The Wolf produces far better coffee than the Cuisinart.Pro:- great coffee, cleaner taste, more aromatic- no steam output from the top making it safe under cabinets- easy access to the water tank and the coffee filter- simple controls- heavy duty - almost 10 pounds- coffee stays hot if you preheat the stainless carafe with hot water- 5 year warranty- FAST brew time - 6-7 minutes- Quiet brewCon:- price - I paid about $420 for the Wolf on sale with points. That is still a bargain compared to high end espresso makers that can top $5k. Thankfully, I’m not an espresso guy.I like this machine. It works well, fits my kitchen counter perfectly, no top steam release that can delaminate of discolor upper cabinets, very quiet (see video), is simple to use and clean and brews quickly, like 7 minutes. Hope that helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits under the cabinet! And it’s fast and the coffee is delicious
reviews.reviewText: I have been eyeing this coffee maker for more than a year. I did research, I compared features, I was tempted to buy something cheaper….. and then one day, while I was at the airport waiting for a flight, I saw this go on Cyber Monday sale….. and I bought it. Now I have it and I love it!!!!!I finally put it where it belongs. Close to the sink and right under the cabinet with the cups. Fridge with milk is on the other side…. I used to wait for my husband to get up and make coffee. I hated our old set-up where I needed to bring a pitcher of water clear across the kitchen. That was the only place with no upper cabinets. Now I have my Wolf coffee maker close to everything and it is amazing. I can’t wait to make coffee in the morning.The accu brew function is amazing. No more counting scoops. A pre-kindergarten person can do it. It brews super fast and the coffee tastes delicious too. (I have tried various coffee grounds, all turned out awesome.).Whoever designed this coffee maker is brilliant. It is practical, easy to operate, and it FITS under a cabinet. No steam dripping down, no pulling out the whole thing to fill it with water and coffee grounds. Love love love!!It is expensive, so it took me a loooong time to pull the plug and buy it. I don’t regret it. I further love that this machine does one thing and that really really well. I have had coffee makers that do different coffees and have all the bells and whistles. But the result was always the same a bulky machine making an ok cup of coffee requiring a lot of work. This one does one thing. It brews an awesome cup of coffeein a short time while standing under my counter and making me happy. That’s perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just came back to this amazing Wolf coffee machine to buy a THIRD one in four months and thought I’d write a review. I’m not a coffee drinker but my husband is and loves really good, higher end, dark roast coffee and grinds his own beans and has tried about every brand of coffee machines out there with some being around a thousand dollars. For his birthday I bought him this Wolf coffee machine after reading great reviews about it on every website I went to. He loves it! He swears it makes the BEST cup of coffee that he has ever brewed. We travel all over the country for his work so we have it in our motorhome. We went to our home in GA at Thanksgiving and he just couldn’t use his Bunn anymore after using the Wolf so we ordered another one to have for our home. Now he wants me to send one to my sister in Virginia and surprise her with a Wolf since she is also a big coffee drinker like him. At $600 I hope this is the last one he has me order! To have a great cup of coffee every morning like this makes, it’s worth every penny and it makes me feel very good to know that I got him a birthday gift that he loves this much! Besides brewing the best cup of coffee, it also looks good sitting on the counter with its red knobs that Wolf is known for. It’s perfect in every way! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Quality; Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Wolf products are expensive but each one I've purchased has been top quality and worth the money. This coffee maker brews a great cup of coffee.

reviews.reviewText: We are very happy with Wolf coffee maker. Best tasting, maintains heat and awesome design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does it need a warmer?
reviews.reviewText: Wolf is a great manufacturer. I bought this to match my current Wolf appliances. I like the weighing option but you can always buy a digital scale and weigh out 15 GMs per serving and save on a less expensive machine. I like toys and it’s convenient feature so the extra money was worth it. I couldn’t figure out why many of the reviews were saying the coffee is cold and I almost didn’t purchase the machine. I take my coffee black so this just has not been an issue at all for me. I can see if you add a large amount of milk it could possibly not be hot enough or if the pot sat for an hour before pouring and adding milk. There is no warmer and the pot is thermal insulated. It does hold temp for 90 minutes so if you don’t drink coffee within that time frame this pot is not for you, especially if you add milk. Taking coffee black the coffee will still be warm after 90 minutes for me but not as hot when it was first made. Not cold but drinkable right away. Wolf needs to put some kind of warmer for those who drink milk. I think it’s a novel idea not to but in the real world most people like coffee very hot 90 minutes latter. For me I drink my coffee within an hour so no issues. The machine is expensive and nothing special about the taste over a $200 machine. It does have a nice feature on brew strength but the weighing option takes care of that. The machine is very easy to use too and easy clean up. It is a Wolf and looks cool and if you have Wolf appliances is there really a choice? I gave it four stars as it should have a warmer and probably cost no more than $400.

The media could not be loaded. Splurged on this coffee maker but got it on sale so it helped a bit. Don’t know why the negative reviews. I love it. Coffee made in under 4 minutes for 10 cups. Taste is amazing as u can customize with beans and adjust strength. Coffee stays smoking hot for way over 1.5hours (without warming up the pot by hot water). Easy to carry and fill water reservoir. Pot has large opening if I want to wash inside. The pour out of it is great. It’s not slow. It’s a normal pour. I realize not everyone can be made happy but common 🙄. I’d highly recommend this coffee maker. Especially knowing that they have great support and a warranty for 5 years! And it looks amazing to boot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Consistent quality once you have decided on your favourite setting.
reviews.reviewText: Just a simple and quick way to make hot coffee for 2 people or 10. Coffee really does stay piping hot for an hour. Secret is the warm the carafe before you start the brew. No drip and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the cheapest, but pretty amazing
reviews.reviewText: After watching several reviews online about this product we took the plunge. I have never spent anywhere close to this amount on a coffee maker in the past, but I am impressed! Lots of functionality to get the perfect cup. Coffee is hot and stays hot for a long time. Love the weigh scale option. Very quiet too. Best price was on Amazon.

What a beautiful coffee machine…very well built…it looks so pretty in my kitchen…lol…I’ve been using the accu-brew feature and the coffee comes out perfect…nice and hot too. Very happy with my purchase.
Makes great coffee. Scale is very useful. Carafe design could use a bit of tweaking; hard not to slop when pouring. Certainly the best drip coffee maker I’ve ever had.
